statements: SELECT * FROM SecurityPatches;
SELECT patch_name, patch_version FROM SecurityPatches WHERE release_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT patch_name, patch_description FROM SecurityPatches WHERE patch_name LIKE '%Hotfix%';
SELECT patch_id, patch_name, release_date FROM SecurityPatches WHERE release_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT patch_id, patch_version FROM SecurityPatches ORDER BY patch_id DESC;
SELECT patch_name, patch_version, release_date FROM SecurityPatches WHERE patch_version = '1.0' ORDER BY release_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM SecurityPatches WHERE patch_id > 10 AND patch_description IS NOT NULL ORDER BY patch_name ASC;
SELECT patch_id, patch_name, release_date FROM SecurityPatches WHERE patch_version LIKE '%beta%' ORDER BY patch_id DESC;
SELECT patch_description, patch_version FROM SecurityPatches WHERE release_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-05-31' ORDER BY patch_version, patch_description DESC;
SELECT patch_name, patch_version, release_date FROM SecurityPatches WHERE patch_version IN ('2.0', '2.5', '3.0') ORDER BY patch_name, release_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM SecurityPatches;
SELECT patch_name, release_date FROM SecurityPatches ORDER BY release_date DESC;
SELECT vulnerability_name, description FROM Vulnerabilities WHERE vulnerability_id = 3;
SELECT patch_id, patch_name, release_date FROM SecurityPatches WHERE vulnerability_score > 8;
SELECT * FROM Vulnerabilities ORDER BY vulnerability_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM SecurityPatches;
SELECT patch_id, patch_name FROM SecurityPatches WHERE vulnerability_score > 5;
SELECT patch_name, release_date FROM SecurityPatches ORDER BY release_date DESC;
SELECT sp.patch_name, v.vulnerability_name FROM SecurityPatches sp JOIN Vulnerabilities v ON sp.patch_id = v.patch_id;
SELECT COUNT(patch_id) AS total_patches FROM SecurityPatches;
SELECT * FROM security_patches;
SELECT patch_name, patch_date FROM security_patches;
SELECT patch_description FROM security_patches WHERE patch_date = '2022-04-15';
SELECT vulnerability_name, vulnerability_severity FROM vulnerability_list;

SELECT patch_name, vulnerability_name FROM security_patches INNER JOIN patch_vulnerability_mapping ON security_patches.patch_id = patch_vulnerability_mapping.patch_id INNER JOIN vulnerability_list ON patch_vulnerability_mapping.vulnerability_id = vulnerability_list.vulnerability_id;
SELECT patch_name, patch_date FROM security_patches WHERE patch_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT patch_name, patch_description FROM security_patches WHERE patch_description LIKE '%important%';
SELECT vulnerability_name, vulnerability_severity FROM vulnerability_list WHERE vulnerability_severity = 'high';

SELECT patch_name, vulnerability_name FROM security_patches INNER JOIN patch_vulnerability_mapping ON security_patches.patch_id = patch_vulnerability_mapping.patch_id INNER JOIN vulnerability_list ON patch_vulnerability_mapping.vulnerability_id = vulnerability_list.vulnerability_id;

SELECT patch_name, vulnerability_name, vulnerability_severity FROM security_patches INNER JOIN patch_vulnerability_mapping ON security_patches.patch_id = patch_vulnerability_mapping.patch_id INNER JOIN vulnerability_list ON patch_vulnerability_mapping.vulnerability_id = vulnerability_list.vulnerability_id WHERE vulnerability_severity = 'high';
SELECT * FROM security_patches;
SELECT patch_name, patch_description FROM security_patches ORDER BY patch_date DESC;
SELECT vuln_name, vuln_severity FROM vulnerabilities WHERE vuln_severity > 5;
SELECT patch_id, MAX(applied_date) AS latest_applied_date FROM patch_history GROUP BY patch_id;
SELECT patch_id, user_id, action_taken, action_date FROM patch_logs WHERE user_id = 123 ORDER BY action_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM security_patches;
SELECT patch_name, patch_description FROM security_patches WHERE patch_id = 1;
SELECT DISTINCT patch_date FROM security_patches ORDER BY patch_date DESC;
SELECT vuln_name, vuln_description, vuln_severity FROM vulnerabilities WHERE vuln_severity > 3;
SELECT ph.history_id, ph.patch_id, ph.applied_date, pl.user_id, pl.action_taken FROM patch_history ph INNER JOIN patch_logs pl ON ph.patch_id = pl.patch_id;
SELECT * FROM Users;
SELECT id, username, email FROM Users WHERE id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM Employees WHERE department = 'IT';
SELECT * FROM Orders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM Inventory WHERE quantity < 10;
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE department = 'IT';
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM employees WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT department, COUNT(*) AS total_employees FROM employees GROUP BY department HAVING COUNT(*) > 5;
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE salary > 50000 AND last_name LIKE 'S%';
SELECT AVG(salary) AS average_salary, MAX(salary) AS max_salary, MIN(salary) AS min_salary FROM employees;
